page.title: 15BRYNSWORTHY NURSERIES
page.content:
BRYNSWORTHY NURSERIES
This is a market garden area covering the sale of general plants such as cabbage, kale, brussel sprouts etc. Also fruit bushes: raspberry canes, a few loganberry varieties but these are tending to die out; gooseberry bushes. They also sell bedding plants. This nursery does not tend to sell the more exotic decorative plants but concentrating more on the practical gardeners needs. They do stock regular fertilisers. It is not a popular nursery being rather off the beaten track and not catering for the small gardener whose main interest is a "hobby".
